New Records: Kieffer Moore scored Wales' fastest goal since 2003 with a 37-second strike.
Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore pounced on the ball in the box and lashed home off the post with only 38 seconds on the clock.
Harry Wilson thumped a long-range strike into the net to give Wales a two-goal lead.
Driton Camaj pulled one back for Montenegro in the second half.
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamyâ€™s side continued their more aggressive, front-foot approach and secured three valuable points.
Manager Craig Bellamy brought excitement back to Wales as his new-look side started their Nations League campaign with a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game played out in driving rain.
Montenegro came back into the game with several chances but failed to equalize effectively.
